review: It has a lot potential, but also does quite a few simple things wrong to annoy the consumers.1. I had search online and manually install itThe good things include all the Prime videos, support of Netflix, ESPN, Showtime app, etc.  And games.

review: Works exactly as described.  I would have given it 5 stars if it worked fully with Amazon Prime Instant Videos.  While it does stream Prime Instant Videos, Amazon selects a VERY limited number of "Recommended" videos - you do not have full access to the Instant Library.  The irony is that Netflix figured a way to stream their full library!
